local_intent: Align to the Coke can, set yaw to 270°, push it 0.15 m left (180°), then retreat and verify visibility.
assumptions: Surface friction sufficient for pushing without slipping
coherence_with_global: Matches global plan: detect, open gripper for pushing, align within 1 cm, set yaw 270 for leftward push, push 0.15 m at 180°, then retreat 0.10 m; includes a visibility check as a minimal verification.
